info.title: Influencerium API
info.description: REST API for Influencerium - Influencer Data Management Platform. Manage influencers, campaigns, data models, and analytics with secure authentication and role-based access control.

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns authentication tokens
Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens
Logs out the current user (client should discard tokens)

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's profile
Returns all active sessions for the current user

delete.description: Revokes all sessions except the current one
Revokes all sessions including the current one (logout everywhere)

post.description: Sends a password reset email to the user (if account exists)

200.description: Password reset email sent (if account exists)

post.description: Resets the user's password using a valid reset token

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile (name and/or email)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of influencers with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, username, or email

get.description: Returns a single influencer by ID
Returns a paginated list of campaigns
Returns a single campaign with its influencers

delete.description: Deletes a campaign and its influencer associations

get.description: Returns a paginated list of data models

post.description: Creates a new data model schema

409.description: Model with this name already exists

get.description: Returns a single data model by ID

delete.description: Deletes a data model and all its data points

get.description: Returns data points for a specific model

post.description: Adds a new data point to the model

get.description: Returns influencer analytics including top performers and trends
Returns campaign analytics and performance data

description.example: Promotion campaign for new smartphone launch

data.description: Data point object matching model schema
